definitions.definition: A slender projection of a nerve cell which conducts nerve impulses from a synapse to the body of the cell; a dendrite .
A section of a dendrimer that includes the central atom or group.

main_definition: ( cytology ) A slender projection of a nerve cell which conducts nerve impulses from a synapse to the body of the cell; a dendrite .
secondary_definitions: ( organic chemistry ) A section of a dendrimer that includes the central atom or group.
